attributes.action: Make Aaron Lingard business manager for Birchwood Mazda in Eastbourne
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Lingard has proven himself time and time again when it comes to both sales and finance figures. All the sales staff believe he deserves a chance in the business manager role. He is the man to move the business forward!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
